obconversion_readstring.py

Reading a smiles string in python.

1 import openbabel as ob
2 
3 # Initialize the OBConversion object
4 conv = ob.OBConversion()
5 if not conv.SetInFormat('smi'):
6  print 'could not find smiles format'
7 
8 # Read the smiles string
9 mol = ob.OBMol()
10 if not conv.ReadString(mol, 'CCCC'):
11  print 'could not read the smiles string'
12 
13 # ... Use OBMol object ...
